body:
Full panic logs:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxGgMbrngfJbQzJZNjdEakJaUHc/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxGgMbrngfJbMWJaeDhUMjhDa1k/view?usp=sharing

As far as cgo, no, the application does not use cgo. I also believe that none of the dependencies of the application use cgo either, after `ag`-ing through the codebase. A graph of `runtime.NumCgoCall()` seems to also confirm this.

And, to double-confirm, the only current environment variable from this thread that this process is running with is `GODEBUG=netdns=go`.
